name: @trustwallet/wallet-core
description: wallet core wasm and protobuf models

scripts.generate: npm run codegen:js && npm run codegen:ts
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist generated && mkdir -p dist/generated generated
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run generate && cp generated/core_proto.d.ts generated/core_proto.js dist/generated && tsc --skipLibCheck
